top_message: To a world where everyone can express themselves
sec1_content:
Marginal competitions are always free to use. 
Marginal competitions are run with donations and pocket money, so you will never be charged a fee.
sec2_content:
All you need to participate is a Discord account and Twitter to post your work!
No qualifications, age restrictions, or troublesome screening!
can_title: What you can do at the Project Genkai
can_content1:
At the Marginal Tournament, you can create with the theme given by the management.
The theme songs and images are operated with the permission of the author, so you can use them with confidence.
can_content2:
The work produced at the Marginal Tournament can be posted to various media such as Twitter. 
Also, since the management RTs the work, it can be seen by many people.
can_content3:
You can talk with other participants to gain knowledge and make friends.
If desired, you can also use the community server Marginal Creation Village.
sec3_content:
限界大会は、過去のお題も遅刻として制作することができます。
過去のお題に制限はなく、第1回から最新のお題まですべて無料で利用できます。
